column1: No US state has a bigger #COVID19 crisis than South Dakota. This a direct result of the failed leadership of Gov Kristi Noem. She should end her laughable run for the 2024 GOP presidential nomination and instead do her job. https://t.co/squ75fG5j5
Please remind me to never hire him as my doctor. #COVID19 kills! https://t.co/mM6EDc2TlG
The American people desperately need more financial help from our federal government as we deal with the worst #COVID outbreak yet.
Folks Donald Trump is lying. House Democrats have passed two different #COVID relief bills. The GOP refuses to even allow a vote on them in the Senate. #debates
Congrats to #JacindaAdern - How I wish my country had a smart empathetic leader who could guide us through #COVID19 with almost no deaths. Counting down the days until a #PresidentBiden
Thank you @DrEricDing for helping spread the facts about #COVID19 https://t.co/995CpH8ksf
Incredible. How many people have been infected with #COVID because of Trump’s irresponsibility? https://t.co/Um0wDi1gJd
I hope they fly gets a #COVID test. #VPDebate2020
Wow. My sympathies with @gtconway3d his wife @KellyannePolls (who once was the pollster for my opponent) and their family. What an awful virus COVID is . . . https://t.co/5ec0gG6djr
My best wishes to @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS for a speedy recovery from COVID-19. Far too many families have had to suffer because of this virus.
I totally agree. I mean who could have guessed questions about obscure topics like COVID health care policing and climate would have come up? https://t.co/zAZdaRI59a

Donald Trump’s Inaugural Address was titled “American Carnage”. And that’s exactly he’s brought us. * 180000+ dead from COVID * Most job losses in 90 years  * Political violence on our streets   To end this carnage we need to vote Trump out.
In just the 4 days of the #RepublicanConvention more Americans have died from #COVID19 than died on 9/11. #RNC2020
I spy a super spreader event #COVID19 #RNC2020 https://t.co/ZkvC7LRpZE

Meanwhile in the alternate universe President Hillary has just been impeached by the GOP Congress because 40000 Americans have died from COVID. This is the 2nd time they’ve impeached her the first being 2017 for her emails.

The sucking up to Trump at this  #RNCConvention would make even Kim Jong-Un blush.  But here’s the reality: the USA is only 4% of the world’s population but we have 25% of the world’s deaths to #COVID19. This is because of @realDonaldTrump’s failure as president. #GOPConvention
The single most dramatic moment tonight from the daughter of a #COVID victim. #DemocraticConvention https://t.co/DvqV47COVb
Given his terrible leadership during #COVID has contributed the deaths of over 160000 Americans it is only fitting for Trump to give his acceptance speech in a cemetery. https://t.co/vAvmXknJT4
This new guidance from The White House on how best to combat #COVID19 is sadly not their worst idea.  https://t.co/osJykbNtLy
We are 4% of the world’s population. We have 25% of the world’s #coronavirus deaths.  Not my definition of “great job.” https://t.co/2Xsm8JSlVB

We are 4% of the world’s population.  But we’re more than 25% of the global deaths from #COVID19.  Our federal governement’s handling of this pandemic was been one of the greatest failures in American history. #Trump
Disgraceful that members like my brother were needlessly put at risk because this reckless GOP member never bothered to tell people he tested positive for COVID-19. https://t.co/jcsXgtFEU8

Just a quick thank you to all the people I interact with every single day who are quietly enduring this crisis the right way. They go about their business wearing a mask staying 6-ft apart etc. There won’t be a viral video about them. But they deserve to be thanked. #COVID__19

Except there aren’t. The combined population of those countries is almost 500 million people. The US population is only 329 million. And yet we have more COVID19 cases despite having far fewer people. https://t.co/gzJto3eTJ4

More people in the United States have #COVID19 than Britain France Germany Russia Italy and Spain - COMBINED! This has been a catastrophic failure of leadership by @realDonaldTrump. He is the most incompetent leader in the world today. #Coronavirus
Our heroes deserve hazard pay. This must be in the next Coronavirus bill.
The Pennsylvania workers are heroes! Great to see so many people sacrificing to help all of us defeat coronavirus.  https://t.co/N4ZbX5ayxl
Today we hit the 15000 mark for the American death toll from COVID-19. But congrats @realDonaldTrump on your tv ratings. https://t.co/GAZb7HzPmj
I really wish @theofficenbc would make new episodes during this #coronavirus crisis.
Only hours after the NIH’s Dr Fauci predicts over 100000 Americans will die from #coronavirus the President is tweeting about his tv ratings. https://t.co/4ZgMrB1fYO
Here in DC for today’s House vote on the #Coronavirus phase 3 bill. Definitely the quickest I’ve ever made it driving from Philly to DC.
I pray that never again my countrymen and countrywomen trust so important an office to a man so unworthy of it. #Trump #COVIDー19

@ilovepaulmcc Our offices are physically closed due to COVID-19 but we are still working on constituent cases. In fact we processed far more cases last week than normal (as the demand for help has sadly increased). As long as you left your number we will call you.
GOP state rep in PA calls for a “State Day of Humiliation” - exactly what we need to defeat #coronavirus https://t.co/CZfA1Vrobz

Those of us with constituent offices interact with people every day. There is a lot of pain out there already. People I personally know who went from fine to out of work almost overnight. Congress & POTUS need to get cash directly in people’s hands now! #coronavirus

Dear @JohnCornyn - A) I happen to like Corona and will keep drinking it. B) More importantly don’t you think you should be back in DC DOING YOUR DAMN JOB and passing the bill we passed at 1am?!?! https://t.co/n807JpoIwU

This is an excellent chart. We must learn from the painful lessons of my hometown’s experience a century ago when they carried on with a public parade that helped infect tens of thousands. Practice #SocialDistancing. #COVID19 https://t.co/VYT1rXHrpx

It’s Friday night in the Capitol and we’re just waiting for @realDonaldTrump to send a damn tweet to give permission to Kevin McCarthy to vote for the bipartisan Coronavirus bill. Just pathetic. https://t.co/BvwltgLYEU

Two of my great grandparents died within one day of one another due to the Spanish Flu of 1918. Suddenly my grandmother was made an orphan. So I’m glad to see governments worldwide working together to combat the #coronavirus. This is a time for all of humanity to work together.

It’s time for 🇺🇸 to join the rest of the industrialized world and have #PaidSickLeave. This #coronavirus illustrates why it’s important not just to those who need it but also to our economy. I’m proud to cosponsor the #PaidSickLeaveBill.

The only qualification @VP Mike Pence has is as supreme Donald Trump kiss-ass. It is frightening that this science denying knuckle-dragger is now in charge of our nation’s response to the #coronavirus. https://t.co/KWroz711jB
